benefits.title: Premium efficiency
benefits.desc: Latest-gen  OSRAM  OSLON® SSL LEDs delivering up  to 144 lm/W.

benefits.title: Scratch-resistant finish
benefits.desc: Added  Anti-Scratch coating  keeps the lamp looking new for years.

benefits.title: Impact-proof lens
benefits.desc: Outer  lens resists sharp debris and stone hits for  reliability in harsh conditions.

benefits.title: Advanced thermal design
benefits.desc: OSLON  SSL chips on a high-conductivity base, rated  for −40°C to +125°C.

benefits.title: High grade Material
benefits.desc: Entire mirrors, stems, and mounts are made of high-strength aluminum, with some models also using steel or stainless steel.

benefits.title: New Technology
benefits.desc: Depending on the model, mirrors are either fully CNC-manufactured or made using advanced high-pressure die-casting.

benefits.title: Expanded Field of Vision
benefits.desc: Slightly curved mirror expands the field of view for better visibility while providing a clear, distortion-free reflection for enhanced safety and riding comfort

benefits.title: Precision Engineering
benefits.desc: Carefully designed and precisely finished for exceptional functionality and aesthetics.

benefits.title: Durable Surface Finishes
benefits.desc: Available in high-quality chrome, anodized, and black finishes—resistant to fading, corrosion, and wear for long-lasting appearance and durability.

benefits.title: Mirror Adjustment
benefits.desc: Precise adjustment ensures safety and a stable mirror position, even in strong winds.

subcategories.name: Universal (M8/M10 Bolt Mount)
subcategories.desc: Fits most motorcycles and mounts to the handlebar with standard M8/M10 bolts, supporting both clockwise and counterclockwise threaded screws.

subcategories.name: Universal (Bar-End Mount 1" & 7/8")
subcategories.desc: Fits most motorcycles with 22mm (7/8") and 25.4mm (1") round handlebars, with the option to mount directly on the handlebar or bar ends.

subcategories.name: For Harley (H-D Mount)
subcategories.desc: Fits most Harley-Davidson models from 1982–2024 with standard long M8 bolts.

subcategories.name: Mirror Fairing Adapters
subcategories.desc: Adapters for installing aftermarket mirrors on stock fairing mounts of sport motorcycles.

subcategories.name: Bar-End Mirror Adapters
subcategories.desc: Adapters for installing aftermarket bar-end mirrors on motorcycles with threaded handlebar holes, ensuring a secure and proper fit.

benefits.title: Durable Material
benefits.desc: Entire footpegs are made of high-strength aluminum for enhanced safety and corrosion resistance.

benefits.title: New Technology
benefits.desc: Depending on the model, footpegs are either fully CNC-manufactured or made using advanced high-pressure die-casting.

benefits.title: Precision Engineering
benefits.desc: Carefully designed and precisely finished for exceptional functionality and aesthetics.

benefits.title: Durable Surface Finishes
benefits.desc: Resistant to fading, corrosion, and wear, ensuring long-term durability and a fresh, high-quality finish.

benefits.title: High Vibration Damping
benefits.desc: Engine vibrations are significantly absorbed thanks to specialized rubber inserts (except for rare models due to their specific design).

benefits.title: Anti-Slip Surface
benefits.desc: Provides strong grip on the footpegs for enhanced safety while riding (except for rare models due to their specific design).

benefits.title: Adjustability of Footpegs
benefits.desc: Footpeg mounts allow for position adjustment along the axis.

benefits.title: Adjustability of Footpegs of Positioning arms of Clamps
benefits.desc: Designed with a wide range of adjustability, allowing for optimal positioning to suit individual preferences (available in different lengths and shapes)

subcategories.name: Rider Footpegs
subcategories.desc: Depending on the motorcycle model, the appropriate mounts are included.

subcategories.name: Passenger Footpegs
subcategories.desc: Depending on the motorcycle model, the appropriate mounts are included.

subcategories.name: Highway Footpegs for 25.4mm, 32mm, 35mm, and 38mm Engine Bars
subcategories.desc: Various types of footpegs and clamps for mounting footpegs on engine bars are available, with a special rubber strap included for a secure installation and surface protection.

benefits.title: High precision CNC Cutting
benefits.desc: Each element is meticulously crafted with high accuracy.

benefits.title: Long-lasting anodized color
benefits.desc: Anodized according to standards for long-lasting resistance to friction and changing weather conditions (ensures durable color).

benefits.title: Stabile positions
benefits.desc: Thanks to the three components that form each adjuster, combined with a high-quality finish, the adjusters maintain a stable position.

benefits.title: Top grade materials
benefits.desc: Entirely CNC-manufactured from reinforced 6061-T6 aluminum.

benefits.title: Usefull adjustments
benefits.desc: Features 6 offset levels, letting you fine-tune the lever position to your preference.

benefits.title: Strengthened components
benefits.desc: Enhance the lever’s longevity and overall durability.

subcategories.name: Classic Short
subcategories.desc: Sporty two-finger design for quicker response, improved control and a 25mm adjustable offset.

subcategories.name: Classic Long
subcategories.desc: Similar to OEM length, with a 25mm adjustable offset.

subcategories.name: 5D Short
subcategories.desc: Sporty two-finger design with a 20mm adjustable offset, featuring a stunning shape.

subcategories.name: 5D Long
subcategories.desc: Similar to OEM length with a 25mm adjustable offset, featuring a stunning shape.

subcategories.name: Cobra Short
subcategories.desc: Sporty two-finger design with a 25mm adjustable offset, featuring a stunning shape of a cobra.

subcategories.name: Foldable & Extendable
subcategories.desc: Foldable design prevents damage from falls, with adjustable length and a 25mm offset.

benefits.title: High grade Material
benefits.desc: Heavy-duty aluminum, high-grade steel, or robust composite (depending on the motorcycle model).

benefits.title: High-Pressure Injection Technology
benefits.desc: Advanced manufacturing ensures exceptional durability (except for steel models).

benefits.title: Uncompromised Precision
benefits.desc: Delivers a perfect fit without stress during installation.

benefits.title: Durability
benefits.desc: Built to OEM standards, providing reliability on the road.

benefits.title: Consistent Power Delivery
benefits.desc: Delivers stable performance in any engine condition.

benefits.title: Reliability
benefits.desc: Built with top-quality components for long-lasting, trouble-free use.

benefits.title: Water and Dust Resistance
benefits.desc: Durable construction shields against moisture and debris, maintaining operation even in harsh conditions.

benefits.title: Aerodynamic elevation
benefits.desc: The elevated surface reduces helmet buffeting and wind turbulence, enhancing rider comfort and focus, especially at high speeds (Some models are available without the elevated surface).

benefits.title: Impact-Resistant Polycarbonate
benefits.desc: Made from pure polycarbonate, far superior to acrylic and ABS, ensuring maximum durability and rider safety.

benefits.title: Crack-Proof & Shock Absorbing
benefits.desc: Withstands accidents, slides, and impacts from rocks or sharp objects, eliminating the risk of dangerous fractures.

benefits.title: Injection-Molded Precision
benefits.desc: Advanced manufacturing guarantees a perfect fit, flawless structure, and no discoloration, unlike pressed alternatives.

benefits.title: OEM-Compatible Dimensions
benefits.desc: Matches factory windscreen size, with a spoiler for improved performance, ensuring a seamless fit without modifications.

benefits.title: Stress-Free Mounting
benefits.desc: Engineered for a precise, strain-free installation

benefits.title: Authenticity
benefits.desc: Each windscreen includes an official hologram, guaranteeing originality and premium quality.

subcategories.name: Precision-Fit (Model-Specific)
subcategories.desc: For most racing, sport, and naked motorcycles, designed to fit specific models.

subcategories.name: Universal Mount
subcategories.desc: Fits most motorcycles, mounting to the same points as handlebar mirrors using existing M8/M10 mirror bolts (Handlebar version) or the mounts of a 7" round headlight (Headlight version).

subcategories.name: For Harley
subcategories.desc: In various heights and shapes to fit different Harley models.

subcategories.name: Hand Wind Protectors (Handguards)
subcategories.desc: Fits most motorcycles, mounting to the same points as handlebar mirrors using existing M8/M10 mirror bolts.

benefits.title: High grade Material
benefits.desc: Made from heavy-duty aluminum, the same material used in original covers, known for its high resistance to damage and wear.

benefits.title: Advanced Technology
benefits.desc: Produced using high-pressure die casting techniques, ensuring exceptional durability.

benefits.title: Uncompromised Precision
benefits.desc: Delivers a perfect fit without stress during installation.

benefits.title: Enhanced Temperature Resistance
benefits.desc: The color withstands extremely high temperatures, maintaining the aesthetic appearance of your bike even under tough conditions.

benefits.title: Durability
benefits.desc: Built to OEM standards, providing reliability on the road.
